name: Paint and Protect (Alpha build)
description:
PAINT AND PROTECT IS BACK WITH A NEW LOOK!!

There was major damage to the game files which delayed development for months. But now Paint and Protect is back and in its alpha stage!!

After months of redevelopment I've been able to bring Paint and Protect back and better than ever with more enemies, more weapons, more difficulty and more paint.

the game has taken a turn towards graphics, coming with amazing visuals, better shading and lighting and more effects and with its infinite waves you'd never want to stop playing.

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to shoot

you can only move in a circular path (your orbit), unless the enemy has invaded your orbit then you may move around inside your orbit while shooting

The screen will turn red when an enemy is at your orb

The HP is not your health but the health of the orb which is also displayed as your orbit

The timer counts how long more enemies would spawn not the time of the wave. When the time is up its up to you to finish off the remaining enemies and proceed to the next wave

the number of enemies and difficulty would start increasing after the 2nd wave

You can clear the paint in the pause menu.

Learn more at the tutorial wave

CAN YOU PAINT THE WHOLE GROUND? Paint and Protect classic is still available to play come check it out here
